name: chunky-biomegen
description: This repository contains scripts to generate Chunky's biomes list from a JSON file that contains all biomes (`biomes.json`) and a biome color map file (`default_biome_profile.json`, which is taken from [Amidst](https://github.com/toolbox4minecraft/amidst/blob/master/src/main/resources/amidst/mojangapi/default_biome_profile.json)).
author: leMaik
